channel.title: Need global [working] portal [circle portal] code, I have cords
channel.description:
I've tryed pretty much every portal code and I can't seem to find a working one.
Could you give me a global portal code with these cords
[code]X: 3431 Y: 3569[/code]These are were the Portal goes. [code]X: 3222 Y: 3218[/code]These are were the Portal teles you to
Thanks.

item.title: Need global [working] portal [circle portal] code, I have cords

item.description:
@delta wrote:

2470 is a portal id you can use

Read full topic

item.title: Need global [working] portal [circle portal] code, I have cords
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

Add this anywhere in client.java

public void makeGlobalObject(int x, int y, int typeID, int orientation, int tileObjectType){ //Makes Global objects for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players){ if(p != null){ client person = (client)p; if((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != "null")){ if(person.distanceToPoint(x, y) <= 60){ person.createNewTileObject(x, y, typeID, orientation, tileObjectType);}}}}}
Search for case 121: and in there add this
makeGlobalObject(xxxx, yyyy, id, 0, 10);
replace xxxx with object x coords replace yyyy with object y coords replace id with the object id

Read full topic
item.source: Need global [working] portal [circle portal] code, I have cords
